name: MASP
description: São Paulo Museum of Art, featuring European and Brazilian art.

name: Ibirapuera Park
description: Urban park with green areas, lakes, museums and outdoor leisure.

name: Pinacoteca
description: Art museum with historical Brazilian collections and temporary exhibitions.

name: Sé Cathedral
description: Main cathedral of São Paulo, example of neo-gothic architecture.

name: Republic Square
description: Central square known for artisan fairs and cultural events.

name: Football Museum
description: Interactive museum at Pacaembu Stadium, celebrating Brazilian football history.

name: Municipal Market
description: Famous market for fresh produce, exotic fruits, and the traditional mortadella sandwich.

name: Paulista Avenue
description: Main avenue of the city, full of museums, cultural centers, and skyscrapers.

name: Modern Art Museum (MAM)
description: São Paulo Modern Art Museum with works by Brazilian and international artists.

name: Liberdade
description: Neighborhood with strong Japanese influence, oriental shops and cultural fairs.
